short_summary: Required services are inspection and maintenance of generator sets - Sept-Iles Airport (Canada).
description: Following the receipt of this Request for Proposal, PWGSC, on behalf of Transport Canada, will be in contact with the selected bidder(s) regarding next steps. Please ensure that your Proposal is clearly labeled with your organization name and address.
tags: Motives and electrical power generation equipment and repair/service for motive and electrical power generation equipment maintenance services for Sept-Iles airport
groupes énergétiques de l'aéroport de Sept-Iles
full_summary:
### EE517-231038: Inspection and Maintenance of Generator Sets - Sept-Iles Airport
### Request for Proposal (RFP)

#### Contract Information
* **Contract Reference**: WS3830092267
* **Public Tender Invitation Date**: 2023-01-17
* **Tender Closing Date and Time** : 2023-01-17T14:00:00
* **Contract Category**: Service (SRV)

#### Procurement and Tendering
* **Tendering Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Procurement Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)

#### Contract Specifications
* **Contract Specification**: The successful vendor will be required to perform the inspection and maintenance of the generator sets at the Sept-Iles Airport.
* **Annex A**: Functional specifications and scope of work

#### Important Dates
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-04-01
* **Expected Contract End Date**: None
* **Bid Submission Deadline**: 2023-01-17T14:00:00

#### Official Documents and Contact Information
* **Request for Proposal (RFP) Link (English)**: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15154539?extsite=MTUxNTQ1MzlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>
* **Request for Proposal (RFP) Link (French)**: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15154539?extsite=MTUxNTQ1MzlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>
* **Contracting Authority**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Person**: Julien Ratte (SPAC/PSPC), julien.ratte@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Bid Requirements
* **All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on or before the closing date, 14:00 HNE, February 7 2023**
* **Bids submitted after 14:00 HNE, February 7 2023 will be deemed non-responsive and will not be considered.**

Note: Assumes that the translator's intention was to have the bid deadline extended until February 7, 2023. If a different bid deadline is required, please advise. 

Only relevant information has been kept, ensuring a smooth flow of text.
